For a toxic-free environment, we have to look at all sources of pollution. The cars we drive, the pesticides we use, how we heat, power, and ventilate our homes, even the noise this all makes: it impacts our health and the fate of the species on which all life on earth depends. https://t.co/eov1l7J17x

By 2050, we want a toxic-free environment. Some deposits may still occur, but they will have reached a level that is no longer harmful to our own health or to the planet. Pollution in the EU still leads to 1 in 8 deaths.

Today, we adopted the #ZeroPollution action plan. A plan to bring the way we live, produce, and consume in balance with the boundaries of the planet. For #ClimateNeutralEU and to prevent the looming loss of one million species, we must halt air, water, and soil pollution ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/lGsEFdqDcb
